about-me-details-first-paragraph: Hi, I am a Frontend Developer based in Munich. My passion is creating dynamic websites and web-apps with high-end user experience.
about-me-details-second-paragraph: My positions in adult education and e-learning technology have sharpened my understanding of human-computer interactions.
about-me-details-third-paragraph: I'm convinced that software development is more than just coding. It must manage the interests of various stakeholders in a holistic approach. I learned this by working in interdisciplinary teams in the past.
send-mail-error: Serverfehler! Bitte versuche es später erneut.

project-descriptions.join:
Join is a CRUD-App in form of an easy to use project management tool. Its core function is a Kanban Board, on which users can switch tasks between columns by drag-and-drop. Tasks can be enriched with various additional data such as assignees, subtasks and labels.

Join was created in a team of 4 web development trainees, in which I was responsible for the Kanban Board subpage.
project-descriptions.el-pollo-loco:
El Pollo Loco is a 2D runner game in a wild west themed world. It features animated characters, a randomly generated level and random endboss behaviour. Players can use mouse, keyboard or touch controls.

I used object-oriented programming to allow for easier maintenance and modular expandability of the project.
